creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
description: brown ground fabric; bottom band of cross stitch embroidery in red, green and tan; body of leggings have three horizontal stripes with appliqués of double zigzag bands and geometric designs inside square in muted multicolors; bands interspersed with vertical rows of three white buttons with red and blue thread; zigzag embroidered bands and tan and rust appliquéd bands at top
title: Pair of leggings
